channel.title: End Of Dayz Recruiting ASAP! Im The Only One Working on this!
channel.description:
Base: exion pi 24/7 Running time Friendly Staff Only 1 atm im owner Active Everyday Guaranteed Our Server includes Minigames ( duel arena is not working right now) Bosses (need to add Them) Great Pking and economy based! Great stores Pvp Shops Donator Shop Pking includes edge hills mage bank green dragons Chaotic weapons All God sword Stance and perfect emotes and animations All skills work (except no skill cape emote :/)
Name Julian (owner)
Im looking for Coders or Model Expert or Animation Experts Were trying to make our server very good atleast 200+ people No Worrys about the vps will be taking care of
Positions Coder: Coder:
Model Expert: Model Expert:
Animation: Animation:
Msn Juliancuban@hotmail.com I would provide with pictures and more but dont have a camera or video corder :(

item.title: End Of Dayz Recruiting ASAP! Im The Only One Working on this!
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

This seems as it’ll become a failed server.

Post some pictures please.

Also read this; http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,393334.0.html

You'll need to provide some sort of evidence that your development team will be successful (ie, pictures).

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

You can provide pictures with a printscreen - there’s no need for camera or a video recorder. Your keyboard should have a button named “PrtSc”. Hit it and paste it on MS Paint.
